tileMap

Class TileMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • tileMap.TileMap

  • public class TileMap
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a map. Uses a .jpg file to load in all tile images and then uses a .map file to read in the map. Sets the appropriate tiles to the right places.
    Author:
    Trevor Aquino

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TileMap(int ts)
      create a tileMap with tiles of size ts
